summary: Windows test suite intermittently exits with code 1 despite all tests passing, with missing test output suggesting a test timeout or pending test issue on that platform.
userImpact: CI builds fail unexpectedly on Windows even when all tests pass, causing false negatives in the test suite.
rootCause: Test framework timeout or pending test handling issue specific to Windows platform causing non-zero exit code despite successful test execution.
resolutionDetails: Issue resolved through improvements to test handling; hasn't been observed in subsequent runs.
keyQuote: Sometimes on Windows this happens, where no tests fail, but exit code is 1
